title: Mount Hua Sect’S Greatest Genius
alternative_title: Mount Hua Sect’s Greatest Genius ;Huashan Sect's Greatest Genius of All Time ;The Hwasan Sect's All-Time Greatest Genius
status: Mount Hua Sect’s Greatest Genius ;Huashan Sect's Greatest Genius of All Time ;The Hwasan Sect's All-Time Greatest Genius
description:
Description :
        Baek Un-ho, a third-generation disciple from a respectable family but lacking inner strength, may be expelled from the Mount Hua sect. However, one day he stumbles upon a fateful encounter with Mong Won-kyung and emerges as an unparalleled prodigy of the Mount Hua sect. Just how powerful will Baek Un-ho become?!
